SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationFrame
Represents a single frame in the animation
AnimationInstance
Represents an individual animation instance for an entity.
AnimationLoader
Utility class for loading animations from sprite sheets (strip files) and from JSON configuration files.
AnimationLoader.AnimationConfig
Immutable record representing the configuration for a single animation.
AnimationTemplate
Represents a reusable animation template containing a sequence of frames.
AnimationTemplateRepository
Implements the **Repository pattern** as a singleton, providing centralized access and management for all shared AnimationTemplate objects.
App
The main entry point of the programme.
AudioLoader
Utility class responsible for the low-level loading of Clip audio resources from the file system or classpath.
AudioManager
The AudioManager is the primary service responsible for the playback behaviour of all audio Clip objects stored within the AudioRepository.
AudioRepository
Implements the **Repository pattern** as a singleton, providing centralized access and management for all shared Clip objects.
Background
Represents a background image that scrolls infinitely in the vertical direction.
Bearing2D
Represents a bearing (direction) in 2D space, measured in degrees.
BlueMage
Represents a Blue Mage enemy in the game.
BlueMage.BlueMageBuilder
Static builder class for constructing and initializing a BlueMage instance.
Bullet
Represents a generic bullet that moves within a JPanel.
Bullet.BulletBuilder
Builder class for constructing and initializing an Bullet instance.
BulletManager
The BulletManager is the primary service responsible for the **active lifecycle** of all bullets in the game.
BulletRepository
Implements the **Repository pattern** as a singleton, providing centralized access and management for all currently active Bullet objects in the game world.
BulletSpawner
Represents an invisible Bullet spawner controlled by a game Entity.
BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder
The EntityBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing an Entity object.
ButtonUtils
Utility class for creating various buttons in the UI.
Enemy
Represents an enemy in the game that is mobile and can move within the game world.
Enemy.EnemyBuilder
Static builder class for constructing and initializing an Enemy instance.
EnemyManager
The EnemyManager is the primary service responsible for the **active lifecycle** of all enemies in the game.
EnemyRepository
Implements the **Repository pattern** as a singleton, providing centralized storage and controlled access for all currently active Enemy objects in the game world.
Entity
Represents a base entity in the game, providing common functionality for all objects within the game world.
Entity.EntityBuilder<T>
Abstract builder class for constructing and configuring properties specific to Entity instances.
GameFrame
The main window that renders the entire app.
GameManager
A manager class (that got way out of control) to manager the entire game.
GamePanel
A component that displays all the game entities
GameplayScreen
The main gameplay screen where the game logic and rendering occur.
ImageLoader
The ImageLoader class is a ctility class responsible for loading image resources from files or the application's classpath.
ImageUtils
The ImageUtils class provides a collection of static utility methods for the manipulation and processing of BufferedImage objects, such as copying and scaling.
InfoPanel
The InfoPanel displays game information (e.g., player health, elapsed time, and score) pause button for the game.
MagentaMage
Represents a Magenta Mage enemy in the game.
MagentaMage.MagentaMageBuilder
Static builder class for creating MagentaMage instances.
MainMenuScreen
Main menu screen of the game.
MobileEntity
Represents a mobile entity in the game that can move around the game world.
MobileEntity.MobileEntityBuilder<T>
Abstract builder class for constructing and configuring properties specific to MobileEntity instances.
PauseMenuDialogue
A Dialog window that serves as the game's pause menu.
Player
Represents a player controlled character in the game.
Player.PlayerBuilder
Static builder class for creating Player instances.
RedMage
Represents a Red Mage enemy in the game.
RedMage.RedMageBuilder
Static builder class for creating RedMage instances.
Renderable
Represents objects that can be rendered on the screen.
Screen
Abstract base class for all game screens (e.g., main menu, gameplay).
Subpanel
Abstract base class for all game screens (e.g., main menu, gameplay).
UIConstants
A utility class providing centralized access to various constants used by user interface (UI) elements and styling throughout the game.
Updateable
An interface representing objects that require their logic to be updated every frame.
